title: Demand the hate group "The Dog You Need Exposed" be removed from Facebook
text:
by: Kathy Rowe target: Mark Zuckerberg Facebook 
There is a hate group on Facebook called The Dog You Need Exposed who for months have slandered , stalked and tried to destroy the wonderful reputable animal charity Thedogyouneed.com. Peter & Jean who run the charity do amazing work with all the animals that are lucky enough to end up in their care they offer hope to animals that others turn away. I have followed Thedogyouneed.com for over three years and seen the great work they have done so to see a vile hate group hound these genuine big- hearted people to breaking point makes me sad and angry. This hate group has been reported to Facebook hundreds of times in the past few months but Facbook do not feel it needs to be removed even though this group has not actually exposed anything .Yesterday was the last straw for me . Peter & Jean offered to take a beautiful 12- year old German Shepherd who has been in the pound for over two years without one offer of a home it was all arranged then yesterday Peter received a call from the pound saying they didn't want the dog to go to him anymore this was because some trolls from the hate group contacted the pound with their unfounded propaganda. This hate group are directly hindering and depriving animals in need of help. This is unacceptable and The Dog You Need Exposed needs to to removed from Facebook.
